aadara samarum katiwu nethu kandulin muthu pabulin nima kalemi sihiwatanaya yamuna thire mahada anduru lena athahara wadinna dewiye pema pidu wu ran katayam yamunawe tharanga mathin matha pilibimbau wewa chamath kara athitha sanda yalith janitha wewa apage pem purawathin derana helu kandulu gala maduratha kirigarunda pawuru paba kalum dewa sanathana wu pem satahan ehi sithuwam wewa hetadina ma enathuru ehi nidanna dewiye sangitha mandale prathirawa nan wu nirmana gi shilpiyano sigiri lenehi ru apsarawan anda wu ee siththarano kawi gi liyuwo pili ru neluwo wen wi giyath lowa muwawen aadare aadare aa ruwin piliru mawila pawa yayi mulu jiwithe sudu midumen dawati ethila dayabarayanani janaka raja du janaki rupa shri abhimuwe theda wikum hakula goluwana dig wijaya kala asaranayanani pawukara anganaki pera pinin ma oba da gawasena angane thathsanin siri yahana wetha sitha ragena ya haki obe wipula ath mahathma gunayen wasan kota kandulu winiwida balanu ayi nirinduni pembarayanani obe dasa thethwanu nibanda dutuwemi dakina manathin janaki dayadarayen pena pidak sema age hadawatha unu nowenam janaka raja diyaniyaka wannata nudunne kima mata waram daiwya ape langin indahalla hamuwu dakadi api denna bhawen bhawaya pera aawase bhawen bhawaya mathu sansare thaniwi unna api denna pethi diluna wana mal thorane apa paya pamula sathutu gange thamath aadara ralithi nange gayanaya : mahacharya sanath nandasiri saha latha walpola “wasanthaye dawasak (1979) me mayi gahayata dawasak da mayi mase eka sanda waruwaka aadara wiyowak sithin ebena sanda wahi poda se nethu kandulu sale wahipoda watunath issara wage mayi gas sewane anduru pethe thanuwa - melroyi dharmawardhana piya kohedayi mawagen asanu epa podi hisa athaga surathal puthe kiya pinak nathida ee sewane inna aho ma amathana wita kiri kawadi sinaha nodaka bandunu aadare ...

pasugiya rajaya samaye karana lada waradi sambandhayen rajapaksha palanaya dipthi bogollagamata samawa di nidahase hasirennata ida di thibunath me aanduwa ewan samawak nodena bawa mano ganeshan amathyawaraya wadiduratath kiya sitiyeya.

udaharanayak lesa, obata eewa pranshaye paris, liyon saha kans hi soyagatha hakiya.
gruha jiwithaya thula waya pakshaya ihala yanu atha.
bas eke pata wenas wunata degollagema thel gahanne mulya aramudalen.
pakshikayeku wana mahinda rajapaksha mahatha agamathi bawata path wiya. 2005 nowambarayedi ee mahatha janadhipathi dhurayata path wiya.
